entry.title: LED 2x4 Flat Panel Light Fixture, 6500K, 50W, AC100-277V, Drop Ceiling LED Lights For Offices & Schools, 175 Watt Replacement(4-Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Panels
Price: 460.99

Experience the finest quality lighting with 2X4 LED Flat Panel Lights. The lights that are best for illuminating a place are also used to make the place highly attractive. These lights emit 6500k color temperature, which produces cool white light, perfect for offices or workplaces. These lights are designed to work efficiently in a voltage range of 100V-277V. These lights are very easy to install and are installed in the ceiling. They have dimmable features through which you can adjust the brightness of the light. They are flicker-free and are highly durable. The 2X4 LED Flat Panel Lights are known for their enhanced visibility and glare-free lighting.

entry.title: 2x4ft LED T-Bar Panel Light Fixture, 55W, 5000K, White, 6600LM, 200 Watt equivalent
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Panels
Price: 210.60 - 442.26 (2 variants)

Fluorescent lights were once considered as a great lighting solution but ever since the inception of LEDs in 1962, it has surpassed all other traditional forms of lighting. Be it in lifespan, brightness, energy-consumption, or performance LED lights outperform any traditional form of lighting easily. These 55W 2X4 LED Panel lights are an ideal replacement for 200W Fluorescent Lights. With a total of 6600 lumens of brightness and a high color rendering index(CRI>80), these lights are among the best luminaires for all your indoor lighting needs be it residential or commercial. The led flat panel lights are DLC listed meaning they are eco-friendly and thus make you rebate eligible. Their sleek and slim design makes them a great choice for hotel interiors, medical and health institutions. The lights come with 50,000 hours of lifespan along with a manufacturer’s warranty of 5 years.
